author: mvila09
title: What is this Mega Bloks?!
review: I got this set in my local TRU when i was maybe 3 or 4 years old.I dont really remember much of this set but i know i used to LOVE this set.Pros Cool car for Lego City Police men,Wheels and tires,Nice chrome piece.Cons No parts are removeable for the minifig,The mini fig looks like a Mega Blok mini fig!****4 stars.Also i do not like the JackStone theme.

author: Yoda____
title: I hate those minfigures
review: Well who doesn't (reference to title) but other than that it isn't that bad. It has a couple  of cool accesories and for young people who aren't very good with lego then it is a great and easy way to strt building a lego car. To be honest it isn't that bad but why are the minifigures so tall, it doesn't make sense. It means that they don't go well with any other theme.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: Good for pieces...
review:
The Police Cruiser set (4600) is a LEGO Jack Stone set which came out in 2001. It comes with 1 minifig and 22 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/4600-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigure:

  • Cop: The cop has a double-sided torso and a printed cap with printed legs. The minifigure is a big piece and the head, the cap, the arms or the legs can't be removed. :-(
Police car:

The police car is very easy to build. There're no play features but you get a big steering-wheel. I think you can build it within 5 minutes. You also get some lights on the back. The only reason why you should get it is for the pieces which you can use for MOC's or brickfilms...

Positive:

Great pieces which you can youse for brickfilms or MOC's
Nice starter set
Price

Negative:

No play features
Minifigure is just a big piece
Too easy to build

All in all it's a great set to get and I would highly recommend you to get this model. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion
Review

author: tisi
title: Jack Stone. Again.
review:
I've written some review about the hideous Jack Stone 'sets', so I'll make just a pros/cons list now.

Pros

  • At least some useful parts (stop sign, barrier, walkie-talkie).
  • Er...khrm...so...um...er...NOTHING ELSE!

Cons

  • Horrible, unplayable minifig. Ugly uniform, nasty nose, and he can't move his hands!
  • Juniorized, useless parts.
  • We get just 22 parts. How shameful!
  • Odd-looking and senseless 'car'. No top, no details, just an awful vehicle with ridiculously big wheels and horrible windscreen. And a spoiler! Yes, that's very important! (WARNING: ironical content!)
  • Big orange siren part (?!).
  • Too big and strange steering wheel.
  • The whole 'set' is as unplayable as a Jack Stone set usually.

In conclusion...well, I think you know...BAD BREAK!
